    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightedSelection

        public WeightedSelection(java.util.function.IntUnaryOperator randomFunc)
        Construct the class with a random number function.

        This function should provide out a random value from 0 to x - 1. This will allow this object to make random decisions and thus a random selection.

        Parameters:
        randomFunc - The random number provider.

      • WeightedSelection

        public WeightedSelection(java.util.Random random)
        Construct the class with a random number generator.

        Construct the selector with the specified random object.

        Parameters:
        random - The random object.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelection

        private <T> int getSelection(java.util.Collection<T> objects,
                             java.util.function.ToIntFunction<T> weightFunction)

      • selectWeightedObject

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> selectWeightedObject(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                      java.util.function.ToIntFunction<T> weightFunction,
                                                      java.util.function.IntFunction<T> extractor)
        Selects an object from the list based on its weight.

        This method determines the weight given to a specific object by using the provided weight function. Once a specific object has been selected, it is extracted by using the extractor; this is used to provided some other way to get the object.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type we are selecting.
        Parameters:
        objects - The list of objects to consider.
        weightFunction - The function which supplies the weight of an object.
        extractor - The extraction method.
        Returns:
        The result of selection.

      • selectWeightedObject

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> selectWeightedObject(java.util.Collection<T> objects,
                                                      java.util.function.ToIntFunction<T> weightFunction)
        Selects an object from the list based on its weight.

        This method determines the weight given to a specific object by using the provided weight function.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type we are selecting.
        Parameters:
        objects - The list of objects to consider.
        weightFunction - The function which supplies the weight of an object.
        Returns:
        The result of selection.
